data.text:
Troma Entertainment's Entire 47 year Library, easily accessible & meticulously curated... featuring as many subtitles & special features as inhumanly possible.

Established in 1974 by Yale friends Lloyd Kaufman and Michael Herz, Troma Entertainment is the longest-running independent movie studio in North America, and it's one of the very few genuine brand names in the industry. Troma is worldï»¿famous for producing and distributing classic films such as Kaufman's "The ToxicAvenger", Trey Parker's "Cannibal, the Musical", "Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead", "Class of Nuke 'Em High", Charles Kaufman's "Mother's Day" and "Tromeo & Juliet". Early works of many of today's luminaries can be found in Troma's library of 1000 films, cartoons, TV shows and shorts. Jenna Fischer, Robert De Niro,Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Costner, Fergie, Vincent D'Onofrio, Samuel L. Jackson, James Gunn and Eli Roth are just a few notable Troma alumni. Troma's latest in house productions are "Return to Nuke 'Em High: Volumes 1 & 2".

www.twitter.com/lloydkaufman, www.twitter.com/troma_team,

www.facebook.com/troma.entertainment

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Troma NOW! on a monthly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: http://watch.troma.com/tos

Privacy Policy: http://watch.troma.com/privacy

brandon lets gooooo69 ,

Best a for streaming

TROMA NOW is a must-have app for any fan of cult cinema. With a vast and ever-growing library of independent films and Troma classics, the app is a treasure trove of entertainment that has something for everyone. The video quality is top-notch and the selection of films is truly impressive.

What really sets TROMA NOW apart is its dedication to independent cinema. The app is a great way to discover new and exciting films that you won't find anywhere else. I love how the app includes bonus content like behind-the-scenes footage and interviews with filmmakers.

One of my favorite things about TROMA NOW is how easy it is to navigate. The app is user-friendly and makes it simple to find what you're looking for. I also appreciate how the app includes features like custom playlists and recommendations based on your viewing habits.

Overall, I highly recommend TROMA NOW to anyone who loves movies. It's a great app that offers a unique and exciting selection of films. Whether you're a die-hard Troma fan or just looking for something new to watch, TROMA NOW is definitely worth checking out.
